msg: GERONIMO-3862 header names are handled in a case-sensitive manner

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3326, DERBY-3328: (partial) Introduce a caching logical connection and logical prepared statement in the client driver & Extend client JDBC object factory with methods to create objects required for statement pooling.
Adds the basic machinery to support statement pooling. There are known defects in the code, but no code has been enabled yet.
The most important defect is the action taken on statement reset, which is currently Statement.reset(true) (a full reset). This will be changed very soon.
